metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9447 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ROM mappings in the NSF decoder in gstreamer 0.10.x allow remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read or write) andpossibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted NSF music file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9447` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer0.10-plugins-bad - 0.10.23-7.2ubuntu1.2
libgstreamer-plugins-bad0.10-0 - 0.10.23-7.2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad0.10 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.23-7.2ubuntu1.2').
